content.en_US:
Used to construct rockets to be used in the [[rocket launch pad|Rocket Launch Pad]]. Rockets are constructed by first selecting a payload and placing it into the top-most slot. Payloads can be either a capsule or any satellite.

Each stage in the rocket can perform one single journey, say from Earth -> Mun. These stages can use stacked fuel tanks and thrusters to increase fuel capacity and thrust (up to 8 fuselages and/or thrusters per stage).

The flight planner on the right hand side is critical for ensuring a given rocket design can perform a given journey. Place the [[drive|Drive]] for the body/station you're launching from in the top slot, and the target destination in the bottom slot.
